attractions.title: Sand Dunes
attractions.name: sand-dunes
attractions.description: A 10,600-acre area of white quartz sand dunes with dunes reaching up to 400 ft.

attractions.title: Upper Mesa Falls
attractions.name: upper-mesa-falls
attractions.description: Upper Mesa Falls, a thunderous curtain of water as tall as a 10-story building.

attractions.title: Teton River Temple
attractions.name: teton-river-temple.webp
attractions.address: 111 Teton River Temple St Rexburg, Idaho  83440 United States
attractions.description: According to building plans, the Teton River Idaho Temple will be a three-story edifice of approximately 130,000 square feet.

attractions.title: Sand Bar
attractions.name: sand-bar
attractions.description: The Sand Bar has been the local swimming hole for more than 60 years and has a fun tube slide and many other fun things you can try out.

attractions.title: Fremont County Golf Course
attractions.name: fremont-county-golf-course
attractions.description: The Fremont County Golf Course is a scenic 9-hole public course located in Saint Anthony, Idaho and offers stunning Teton views.

attractions.title: Henry Fork Greenway
attractions.name: henry-fork-greenway
attractions.address: 420 North Bridge Street St. Anthony, Idaho 83445
attractions.description: A multi-use trail that runs along the Henry's Fork of the Snake River for many recreational activities.

attractions.title: Monkey Rock
attractions.name: monkey-rock
attractions.description: A beautiful waterfall that when visited at the right time can be a very peaceful place to be in nature.

attractions.title: Teton Dam Site
attractions.name: teton-dam-site
attractions.description: The Teton Dam, catastrophically failed on June 5, 1976, causing widespread flooding and damage. It is now a tourist site.
